snippet.title: Vactics - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Vactics - coming to Steam Early Access: June 22, 2022.

Build your mech to fight against the robotic Vactics. Each time you play the game will assemble a new randomised Solitude City to liberate in tactical combat.

Steam Demo and Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1938290/Vactics/
Itch.io Demo: https://thelemurconspiracy.itch.io/vactics

More info: https://vacticsgame.com

Twitter: https://twitter.com/verbvirus
